text: Ticket #12847: Customer reports that the mobile app crashes when trying to upload photos. Issue started yesterday after the latest app update (version 2.3.1). User has iPhone 12 running iOS 16.4. Error occurs consistently when selecting photos from gallery. App works fine for text posts and comments. Customer has already tried restarting phone and reinstalling app with no success. Priority: High - affecting multiple users based on app store reviews.

response.diagnosis: It seems there might be an issue with photo uploads on the latest version (2.3.1) of our app, affecting iPhone 12 users running iOS 16.4.
response.assurance_of_resolution: Our team is currently investigating this problem to ensure a prompt resolution.
actions_taken: Informing the development team about the issue
Analyzing app logs and error reports
suggested_workarounds: Please try updating your iOS version, if available. If not, we recommend waiting for our next update.
If possible, use a different device or web browser to upload photos temporarily.
response.estimated_time_of_resolution: We expect to have a fix in place within the next 48 hours, but will keep you updated on any changes.
response.closing: Thank you for your patience and understanding. We appreciate your continued support.
